attributes.action: Stop taxing the ordinary members of the British public to death, those members who are currently the most taxed and regulated individuals in the world. Allow them to be governed in an open, honest and transparent way free from stealth and unwarranted taxes. Allow individual enterprise to benefit society by not persecuting and demoralising the soul of an individual with a system that appears to take from the poor and give to the rich. Put Great before Britain not tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
